extendedInfo.description: Cold? Do you have to wait on a bus station? Use this hot heater to warm your hands. Features: - High tech heater - Nice graphics - Lock mechanism - 4 different levels Have fun :-)This app is for entertainment purposes only.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Lol, I don\'t what ur problems r guys, this app works fine for me, heats up an turns off when I want it. HTC disire xx
reviews.author: simone campbell

reviews.title: To all the people who said it doesn\'t work.......
reviews.comment: ummm......HELLO? Does the app not EXPLICITLY state that \"this app is for entertainment purposes only\"? But no, you couldn\'t take TWO SECONDS and read the description. It is a JOKE APP, for Pete\'s sake!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Actually works
reviews.comment: Idk about you guys, this thing actually does what it says. It will vibrate your phone and I assume, turn on other processes to high to convert your battery to heat.   One thing to add would be an OFF button instead of exiting the app
reviews.author: Simon Chen

reviews.comment: It\'s good but foes it damage your phone if you use it too long? Surely if its heating up the circuits its bad?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good if You are Desperate
reviews.comment: Works, but takes a long time and isn\'t very warm. If you really need to warm your hands, I would just get bad piggies. It is faster, warmer, and more fun
reviews.author: David Walker

reviews.comment: Rubbish app I think reading some of the comments might have save my phone from being broken.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love it but the screen doesn\'t lock & keeps switching to the tacky ads
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Hate it that app wont stop vibrateing u have to turn da fone off to stop vibrateing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It went from 84\302\260F to 97\302\260F, okay, good free! Droid X
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Got a weird vibration on my n1. could break ur phone apart. how did google let this defective app on market?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I luv it
reviews.comment: It really work n the begging o thought it would be a cheesy app. O guess I thought wrong.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: cool i guess
reviews.comment: im freezin buy this it helps
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I can\'t believe this is still here. Your phone is a computer. It\'s not supposed to get hot. It\'s only free till it breaks your phone. Lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: All it does is make your phone vibrate, and it won\'t turn. Off terrible app don\'t download
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I downloaded this app, and i\'m afraid to say that it was quite frankly shocking. It blew up the connection to charge my phone and as you can imagine
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT WANT STOP VIBRATING ITS VABRATING LIKE WRIGHT NOW WHEN IM TYPEING THIS
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Makes your phone vibrate all the time and you have to restart it to stop it nearly wrecked my phone
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Waste of time!!!! If you wanna kill your phone go for it

reviews.comment: Its crap you downlode or buy it be ready to get a new phone
